title: It's a Pattyfab-ulous day!
content:
_There was a birthday girl from New York  
Who bought wine bottles she would later uncork.  
As she lived in Manhattan,  
She neither spoke Latin  
Nor dressed or sang like Bjork._

If you saw your shadow this morning, does that mean there will be six more weeks of winter boot shopping? ;-)

 [‹ Tuscan brackets](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41566 "Go to previous forum topic") [Automobile Magazine Fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41698 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content: Birthday wishes must be in order, then. Happy Birthday Patty!
Happy birthday!
Happy Birthday!

Happy Birthday, Patty!

Sharon
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/party_6111.jpg)

From an El Alien to a New Yorker happy birthday Patty. Have a great day.

pbc
Have a happy one, Patty.
happy birthday, patty!
I hope your Groundhog Day is as Awesome as Bill Murray’s was at the end of Groundhog Day!

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/New-York-patty_4223.jpg)

ChrisL
Patty, Happy Birthday indeed!

Have a fabulous time on your birthday Patty :^)

j a m e s

Thanks all!

I did NOT see my shadow today, which means spring is coming. Given we have had less than .1” of snow this winter here in the apple and that it’s supposed to go up into the 50s and 60s later this week I’d say my prediction is looking good... The little rat in Pennsylvania saw his shadow, but come on, who ya gonna believe?

Chris: Low-fat food, huh. I think today I’ll indulge.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fab_3800.jpg)

and how nice that the French president chose to tie the knot with a supermodel on my special day...

Patty,  
I hear the cheesecakes in New York are indulgent (got to be better than the average fare around here).

ChrisL
H A P P Y B I R T H D A Y P A T T Y
Chris — the recipe I’ve got for authentic NYC cheesecake has 2.5 lbs of cream cheese and 8 eggs. You can’t eat more than one piece in 6 hours, trust me.... ;-)
I like the ricotta style cheese cake - it’s much lighter. But I don’t think that’s classic NY style. I just ate some rugelach, that’s a nice NY dessert too.

Hapapappy Birthdayay!

T
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/patty_6666.gif)

There is only one thing I can say!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/pattyfabulous_4907.png)

Happy Birthday, Ms. Fab!

:-)

Happy Birthday.  
_(Alles Gute zum Geburtstag.)_

Dav(id)

Joyeux Anniversaire

Growing up outside of Germantown, with mostly with the French in Manhattan - (it was/is a melting pot!) that’s how we say it...

Happy BIrthday, Patty. I am happy to know you — and to learn through the years how much in common we have.

Enjoy,

Jackie

Gefeliciteerd met je verjaardag! :)

(to jump in on the languages thing)

Rage your Age ...!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/H_BDay_Patty_3567.jpg)
hope it’s lovely!
Hap-fabulous Birthday!
Happy BIRTHDAY to Patty!

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705161903im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/birthday_party_typo_4903.jpg)
  
Happy Belated Birthday, Patty!

Happy Birthday, Patty!

how young are you? 26, no? :)

Shake it, sista!  
Happy belated birds-day, Pat. I think you’re fabulous!  
Lore
Late to the party. A happy and productive new year, Patty!
Thanks again, everybody. I’m still recovering from my birthday/groundhog party.
